Cheshire is an independently owned & operated Coffee & Dessert Shop located in Atlanta, GA. Desperately needing to escape the corporate world, we started Cheshire in 2002. The result was a very special coffee house, one like no other, with Free Wi-Fi Wireless, leather chairs, comfy couches & a special counter where you can sit and shoot-the-breeze with our staff. The atmosphere is super inviting, with great music and soft lighting. At Cheshire, you will taste the most amazing coffee youâ€™ll probably ever have. We take great pride in the way we hand craft every drink we make.
